title: Thumbnail of Group
author: changbowen
body_snippet:
Is it possible to add something like the thumbnail feature in Remote Desktop Connection Manager?
Not just for viewing, also the thumbnails are accepting inputs so I can do simple operations on the thumbnails (such as logging off).
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/15975872/26713871/4e0e64c2-47a1-11e7-84aa-23543c4519cd.png)

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: We can look into it. I remember there was a similar request proposed a while ago, but I can't seem to find the ticket now.

comments.author: changbowen
comments.snippet: Thanks! That would be the last nice feature that RDCMan has and mRemoteNG doesn't :)

comments.author: diflyon
comments.snippet: Yes, it will be great if mRemoteNG will support thumbnails.

comments.author: alexcostars
comments.snippet: In my case I need to open, side by side, 18 connections. This functionally will be amazing!
